title: Patching failed?
body: Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004). When i open client this shows up. It was working fine a hour ago.

replies.body:
Sorry I couldn't get to you sooner to help! If you see that 004 error in the future, I'd try checking out the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) first to see if that does the trick.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
